thread.title: Ground News - New water test results from Arlington apartment reveal high levels of bacteria, professor says
thread.title_full: Ground News - New water test results from Arlington apartment reveal high levels of bacteria, professor says

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - New water test results from Arlington apartment reveal high levels of bacteria, professor says
text: The News4JAX I-TEAM has uncovered more evidence of possible water contamination at an Arlington apartment complex.Test results of water samples from a tenant’s sink and shower revealed high levels of bacteria that a UNF microbiologist said could make people sick.The I-TEAM has been following this story at the Red Bay Apartment Complex on Arlington Expressway for the past week. Now, the apartment complex said they have hired an outside company to… 46 minutes ago·Jacksonville, United StatesRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
